member.name: T:EPUBackoffice.Dal.DataBaseConnector
member.summary: This class provides a connection to the SQLite database-file. Its methods get or save files from/to the DB.

member.name: F:EPUBackoffice.Dal.DataBaseConnector.connect_settings
member.summary: Sets the connection string. User gives path to .db file.

member.name: F:EPUBackoffice.Dal.DataBaseConnector.mockDB
member.summary: Is true, if the mockDB shall be used. Is false, when real SQLite-DB shall be used (default).

member.name: M:EPUBackoffice.Dal.DataBaseConnector.CheckDataBaseExistance
member.summary: Gets database path out of config file, checks if the database file exists and if mock database shall be used.
member.returns: bool. true: file exists, false: file does not exist or invalid path in .exe.config file.

member.name: M:EPUBackoffice.Dal.DataBaseConnector.CheckDataBaseExistance(System.String)
member.summary: Checks if database file exists at given path.
member.returns: bool. true: file exists, false: file does not exist.

member.name: M:EPUBackoffice.Dal.DataBaseConnector.SetDatabasePath(System.String)
member.summary: Saves path of SQLite database in .config-file.
member.exception: Thrown when configuration file could not be edited."
member.param: File path of the SQLite database.

member.name: M:EPUBackoffice.Dal.DataBaseConnector.UsingMockDatabase
member.summary: Searches the config file for entry "mockDB" and saves value in private var this.mockDB
member.returns: true, if mockDB shall be used

member.name: M:EPUBackoffice.Dal.DataBaseConnector.createDataBase
member.summary: Connects to the database and creates its tables if they do not exist yet.

member.name: F:EPUBackoffice.Gui.HomeForm.components
member.summary: Required designer variable.

member.name: M:EPUBackoffice.Gui.HomeForm.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Clean up any resources being used.
member.param: true if managed resources should be disposed; otherwise, false.

member.summary: Required method for Designer support - do not modify the contents of this method with the code editor.
